name: Growtopia Clicker
description:
Growtopia Clicker is a fun made project of Growtopia. 

In this game, you need to click to earn stuff. Earn blocks, sell them, get world locks and other cool stuff which will be out in the future.

(Now it's just an pre-pre-pre-pre-pre alpha super mega test version of the game. But I will continuine developing it, as I have really good ideas about what to add into the game). Everyone can give their ideas in the comments :D

(This game does not require any verification stuff and can be played ONLY in browser, on this itch web-page!)
